Package components

Class BarComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • components.BarComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class BarComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    Main class of bar diagram component. It uses get and set methods to change components properties. Component is a JPanel containing all necessary sub-components to build a bar diagram.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setBarsNumber

        public void setBarsNumber​(int barsNumber)
        Setter method to set Integer for number of bars in bar diagram. It also creates all sub-comopnents of bar diagram depending on the number of bars, and adds all necessary listeners for component.
        Parameters:
        barsNumber - Integer number of bars in bar diagram and all necessary sub-components.
